items.sentence: Tom expected to leave early in the morning, but he overslept.
Three motorcyclists have died at this intersection this year.
Kindergarten children act better than Tom and his friends do.
Tom has been told several times not to sing so late at night.
Tom has been trying to learn to speak French for a long time.
Tom hid the gun in the cookie jar on top of the refrigerator.
Tom is apparently some kind of genius when it comes to music.
I planted various fruit trees on my property three years ago.
I really do want to devote some more time to studying French.
Tom has a lot of religious books, but he has never read them.
